mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopping_cart (user_id, product_id, quantity, created, updated) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shopping_cart WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM shopping_cart WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT sc.*, p.name as product_name, p.icon_url, p.price FROM shopping_cart sc JOIN products p ON sc.product_id = p.id WHERE sc.user_id = #{userId}
